thread.title: Try exotic fruits at these adventurous eateries
thread.title_full: Try exotic fruits at these adventurous eateries

author: Editor
title: Try exotic fruits at these adventurous eateries
text:
Posted on August 26, 2015 by Editor 
Exotic fruits, with an array of unusual textures, colors and names, are often associated with tropical or remote regions around the world. However, there are plenty of opportunities to taste and enjoy unique and unknown fruits in metropolitan areas where all kinds of global ingredients appear on menus unexpectedly. Explore the gallery above for restaurants and cafes that offer a taste of the exotic (and sometimes surprising) world of fruit — and add a few new words to your foodie vocabulary.
